summary: The government cover-up of the causes behind a massive explosion in a futuristic UK metropolis spur photo journalist Jennifer Preston on to search for the truth and in the process blow open a paranormal phenomenon haunting the city.
cast: Natalia Tena|Iwan Rheon|Jamie Draven|Danny Webb|Franz Drameh|Adrian Schiller|Eleanor Matsuura|Brian Ferguson|Emilia Jones|Tom Goodman-Hill|Richenda Carey|Christopher Jordan|Elina Alminas|Aiste Gramantaite|Richard Crehan|Martha Godber|Sophie Adams|Richard Massara|Sam Benjamin|Bobby Coello|Tom Gibbons|Elliot Pizer|Danny Steele|David G. title: Residue
